item.title: Russia still 'working with US' after Trump says he is 'angry' with Putin
item.description: In its first response to Trump's criticism of Putin, the Kremlin tried to play down the tensions between the two leaders.

item.title: Global shares slide as Trump tariffs loom
item.description: The US president suggests the new import taxes he is set to announce this week will hit all countries.

item.title: Red Cross outraged over killing of medics by Israeli forces in Gaza
item.description: Six Civil Defence first responders and a UN employee were also killed in the incident in Rafah on 23 March.

item.title: 'I feel guilty for not being in Myanmar - our people need us the most now'
item.description: They fled war - now Myanmar's diaspora feel helpless watching their country struggle after the quake.

item.title: What caused the Myanmar earthquake - and why did it make a tower in Bangkok collapse?
item.description: The size of the earthquake and the length of the fault line it occurred on contributed to the devastation.
